lead_paragraph: STEINMULLER--Lillian. May 5, 1931 - February 21, 2016. My beloved wife Lillian died from complications of her longstanding Parkinson's Disease. She was an incredible woman, filled with an indomitable zest for life, for growth and for learning. She continually reinvented herself from school teacher to artist and, eventually at age 59, entered a graduate program, earning a PHD and becoming a gifted and sought after Psychologist. She is survived by her son Bennett and her daughter Franci McFarland and grandsons Sawyer and Turner. She lives on in our hearts forever. The funeral will be held at Plaza Jewish Community Chapel on Friday at 12. The family will be sitting Shiva Friday from 4:30 on at 205 East 69th Street. 1/3
